items.label: ENTRY 0001
items.text: Shift initiated. Diagnostics nominal. Empty bandwidth, full archive.

items.label: ENTRY 0002
items.text: Band-7 registered a clean spike just above the noise floor. Logged as low-priority anomaly.

items.label: ENTRY 0003
items.text: Archive consolidation complete. Auto-summaries growing more verbose, like the system is clearing its throat.

items.label: ENTRY 0004
items.text: Storage cradle 4 pinged during rest phase. Localized impulse matches prior Band-7 deviation profile.
